name: bark-bot-platform
description: BARK Bot is a powerful platform designed to simplify the management of multi-signature transactions, all through an intuitive Telegram bot interface. The bot integrates with Dialect's Blink protocol to provide seamless cross-platform transaction creation, making it easier than ever to manage treasury operations and group decision-making. It supports various commands like /start and /stop, and interacts with the BARK API to fetch transaction details.
author: BARK Protocol
